page.title: 03Use of houses in Grindon
page.content: In Grindon we counted eighteen private houses, six council houses, eleven farm houses, seven holiday homes, two cafesin houses, one bed and breakfast place, one pub, one village hall and one art and craft shop. In the gift shop are pictures, sweets, flowers, books, glasses, candles, pots, apples and other things which tourists can buy for souvenirs. A vicar built the little cottage which houses the shop and he lived there for a while. Then he heard about a man who lived rough in the forest, so the vicar moved out of the little cottage and he put the old man in the little cottage. After the old man died someone purchased his cottage and named it Rock Cottage after the old man, who's name was Rock. The present owner of Rock Cottage is Betty Osscroft.
